a-size-base 2: Reviewed in the United States on October 19, 2021
a-size-base 3: I try to brush my dog's teeth a couple of times a week, but some days, he is just not having it and he will let me know that. Dental treats such as these are a great way to keep his teeth clean while also leaving a nice fresh breath behind. No issues with swallowing large chunks nor loose stool with using this product.

a-size-base: Dogs Love it and go crazy for it
a-size-base 2: Reviewed in the United States on November 1, 2021
a-size-base 3: I have been giving my dogs dental treats for years and of course they love treats. My store was out of their normal ones so I decided to give these a try. As I ripped open the bag they both went crazy sniffing the air. They knew! These say they are for moderate chewers. My pit is a power chewer however she took her time eating this dental treat. They smell delightful compares to other "natural" scented/flavored products. I will definitely be adding these to my shopping list for my girls.
